Hero.title: Find Your Perfect
Hero.subtitle: Join communities, set your learning goals, and get matched with partners who share your passion. Chat, collaborate, and grow together with AI-powered insights.

Features.title: Everything You Need to Learn Together
Features.subtitle: Powerful features designed to help you find, connect, and learn with the right partners

matching.title: Matching that works
matching.description: We look at your goals, skill level, and what you want to learn, then find someone who's a good fit. No swiping, no guessing.

chat.title: Built-in chat
chat.description: Message your matches directly in the app. Plan sessions, share resources, or just check in on each other's progress.

summaries.title: Auto summaries
summaries.description: After each chat, get a quick summary of what you discussed and what to work on next. Keeps you accountable without the effort.

goals.title: Track your goals
goals.description: Write down what you're learning and where you're at. Update it as you go. Simple goal tracking that doesn't get in your way.

communities.title: Join communities
communities.description: Find groups of people learning similar things. Whether it's coding, design, or YouTube, there's probably a community for it.

setup.title: Quick setup
setup.description: Sign up, fill out your profile, and you're ready to get matched. Takes a few minutes, not a few hours.

HowItWorks.title: How It Works
HowItWorks.subtitle: Get matched with your ideal learning partner in four simple steps

step1.title: Pick a community
step1.description: Browse communities and join the ones that match what you're trying to learn.

step2.title: Add your goals
step2.description: Tell us what you want to learn, where you're at, and what you're working on.

step3.title: Get matched
step3.description: We'll find someone with similar goals and pair you up for accountability.

step4.title: Start learning
step4.description: Message your match, set up sessions, and help each other stay on track.

Pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
Pricing.subtitle: Choose the plan that works best for you. Start free and upgrade as you grow.

CTA.title: Stop learning alone
CTA.subtitle: Get matched with someone who's learning the same things. Hold each other accountable. Make real progress.

Dashboard.title: Dashboard
Dashboard.reviewMatchesDescription: Review and accept your matches to start chatting

addGoal.placeholder: What do you want to learn?

aiMatching.title: AI-Powered Matching
aiMatching.description: Our AI will analyze your learning goals and automatically match you with the most compatible learning partners in this community.
aiMatching.noGoals: Add learning goals first to enable AI matching
